segments.text: What do you make of the case ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you ask me , I don ’ t think it ’ s guilty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean by saying so ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I mean it ’ s not his fault .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Don ’ t you think he should be pitied rather than accused ?
segments.speaker: S2
